description: This file defines a React functional component named ProtectedRoute that manages route access based on user authentication status and roles, utilizing react-router-dom for navigation components.

methods.name: ProtectedRoute({ isAuthed, allowedRoles, userRole, redirectTo = "/login" })
methods.description: React functional component that conditionally renders child routes or redirects based on authentication and role checks.

ctags.name: ProtectedRoute
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ProtectedRoute({ isAuthed, allowedRoles, userRole, redirectTo = "\/login/
